parameters.name: Instance
parameters.description: Index of one repeating element in this local sketch-driven pattern feature (see Remarks )

title: ILocalSketchPatternFeatureData.GetTransform
description: Gets the transform for the specified instance in this sketch-driven component pattern feature.

parameters.name: Instance
parameters.description: Index of one repeating element in this local sketch-driven pattern feature (see Remarks )

remarks:
Valid values for Instance are 1 <= Instance <=
ILocalSketchPatternFeatureData::GetPatternComponentCount
